```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
temp_fun<- function(T){
  
  temp = min(T/100, T)
  return(temp)
}

temp <- temp_fun(0)

econ_fun <- function(temp, B = 0.05){
  K = exp(-B*temp^2)
  return(K)
}

ggplot(data.frame(x = c(0, 200)), aes(x = temp)) +
  stat_function(fun = temp_fun)

r <- function(d=0.005, n = 0.5, g=0.01){
  r = d + n*g
  return(r)
}

r <- r()
```
